sentence:
Located in the heart of Haldia this mall offers a perfect blend of shopping dining and entertainment options The moment I stepped inside The mall boasts a range of stores from local boutiques to international brands catering to diverse tastes and preferences

The food court is a delight with a variety of cuisines to choose from including local Bengali delicacies fast food and fine dining options I was impressed by the quality of food and service The mall also features a multiplex cinemaSVF HALDIA available in both D and D

Overall I highly recommend Haldia Ambuja City Centre Mall for its unique blend of shopping entertainment and community spirit Whether youre a local or a new to this town this mall is definitely worth a visit
label: POSITIVE

sentence:
City Centre Mall in Pandri is a popular shopping destination in the area offering a wide range of retail stores entertainment options and dining choices

Shopping The mall houses a diverse selection of stores catering to various tastes and preferences From fashion boutiques to electronics outlets you can find everything you need in one place The stores are wellorganized making it easy to navigate and locate specific shops

Entertainment City Centre Mall usually features entertainment facilities like movie theaters gaming zones and kids play areas This makes it an ideal place for families and friends to spend quality time together

Dining The mall typically offers a variety of dining options ranging from fast food joints to sitdown restaurants You can savor both local and international cuisines making it a culinary delight for food enthusiasts

Ambiance The overall ambiance of the mall is usually modern and wellmaintained Cleanliness and a comfortable shopping environment are often well taken care of

Parking Adequate parking facilities are typically available to accommodate the influx of shoppers making it convenient for visitors with their own vehicles

Accessibility City Centre Mall is often located in a central area making it easily accessible by public transport which is an added advantage

Sales and Offers Keep an eye out for any ongoing sales or special offers as malls often have promotions that can make your shopping experience even more rewarding
label: POSITIVE

sentence: City Centre Mall Siliguri is a bustling commercial hub renowned for its wide array of shopping dining and entertainment options Strategically located in the heart of the city the mall caters to a diverse clientele from local residents to tourists seeking a comprehensive retail experience The mall boasts a variety of highend and midrange retail stores offering everything from fashion and electronics to home goods and specialty shops In addition to its shopping attractions Multiplex City Centre Mall features an impressive food court with international and local cuisine making it a popular spot for dining The entertainment facilities including a stateoftheart multiplex cinema ensure that visitors have a full day of activities at their disposal Modern architecture ample parking and convenient access further enhance the appeal of this vibrant urban center However there are not ample seats to sit on
label: POSITIVE

sentence:
The City Centre Shopping Mall offers a wellrounded shopping experience combining a wide array of retail outlets dining options and entertainment facilities Heres a breakdown

Retail  Shopping

The mall houses a diverse selection of stores ranging from highend fashion brands to more budgetfriendly options International retailers like Zara HM and Apple coexist with local boutiques offering something for every shoppers taste and budget The layout is wellorganized making it easy to navigate from store to store

Dining Options

City Centre has a variety of dining establishments from fast food chains to sitdown restaurants offering global cuisine The food court offers affordable quick meals while the standalone restaurants cater to more relaxed dining experiences with a mix of both international and local dishes

Entertainment

Theres plenty to do beyond shopping A cinema offers the latest movies and there are often seasonal activities or promotions such as popup markets or live performances Families will appreciate the play zones for kids ensuring that the mall is an enjoyable place for all ages

Atmosphere  Ambience

The mall is spacious modern and clean with ample seating areas for rest Its airconditioned providing a comfortable environment even during busy shopping periods During peak hours the mall can feel a bit crowded but overall its a pleasant space to spend time in

Accessibility  Parking

City Centre is easily accessible by public transportation and the parking facilities are extensive though they can fill up during weekends and holidays The mall is also accessible for people with disabilities with ramps elevators and designated parking spaces

Pros

	Wide variety of stores
	Excellent dining options
	Modern and clean environment
	Good entertainment facilities

Cons

	Can get crowded during peak times
	Parking might be challenging on weekends
	Some stores may feel a bit pricey for budgetconscious shoppers

Overall Verdict

City Centre Shopping Mall is a great allinone destination whether youre shopping dining or simply looking for entertainment Its wellsuited for individuals families and groups providing a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience
label: POSITIVE

sentence:
Ecospace Business Park is located in Newtown Kolkata and it houses a number of IT and financial companies alongwith banks Companies like Tata Consultancy Services Jio Nexval Acclaris and many others have their office here There are banks like ICICI and SBI present here The campus is beautifully decorated and well maintained with lots of trees and greenery inside the campus The roads are wide and security guards are there at all points inside Inside the capus there is an open ampitheatre where various food festivals are held There are also the outlets of a number of food joints like Dominis Pizza Wow China Wow Momo The Yellow Straw Banana Leaf Tea Junction etc There are also  restaurants namely the Zebra Lounge and the Village There is also the outlet of a medicine shop namely The Frank Ross Also recently a bird house has been opened here
Overall its a nice and green campus
label: POSITIVE

sentence:
The Beginning
The Neotia family has been an integral part of the business scene in Kolkata for nearly  years Originating from Rajasthan their forefathers settled in the city some time in s being attracted to the opportunities for enterprise that the city offered Since then Kolkata has been their home and subsequent generations have been born and brought up here

  The founders
Patriarchs of the Ambuja Neotia Group Late Shri Suresh Neotia and Late Shri Vinod Neotia started their entrepreneurial career in the mids Their eldest brother Shri Bimal Kumar Poddar was adopted by their maternal grandfather Shri Janki Prasad Poddar a partner of the celebrated firm Tarachand Ghanshyamdas This was probably one of the first wholly Indian registered partnership firms during the time of the British occupation of India It was a trading firm that had offices right from Karachi in Pakistan to Shanghai in China It began with interests in banking and insurance and later diversified into distribution of petroleum products as a franchisee of Burma Shell


RKBK Expansion

Following the sad demise of Shri Bimal Kumar Poddar in  Late Shri Suresh Neotia and Late Shri Vinod Neotia took charge of the family business Under their leadership Radhakrishna Bimal Kumar continued its expansion with major forays in trading operations of cement fertilizers and petroleum products Having a gross turnover of Rs crores by the early s it continues to maintain a steady growth


Ambuja Cements

The two brothers relying on their vision and vast experience joined hands with Mr Narotam Sekhsaria brother of Bimla Poddar wife of Late Bimal Kumar Poddar to promote Gujarat Ambuja Cements Limited GACL in the mid s In a few years the company earned Blue Chip status and became a leader in the cement industry The Group came up with the citys first business club The Conclave where work and pleasure met in an atmosphere of grace


The Rise of a Legend
Under the stewardship of Harshavardhan Neotia the group made its foray in realty and hospitality sectors The Groups first residential project UdayanThe Condoville a JV with the Government of West Bengal established new benchmarks in PublicPrivate Partnership to promote social housing and was declared a Model Housing Project by HUDCO Mr Neotia was honoured with Padma Shri by the President of India in 


New Beginings

Bhagirathi Neotia Women  Child Care Centre BNWCCC was launched in the year  as the Groups first healthcare initiative offering the most advanced medical facilities for women and children in Kolkata Expansion in the hospitality sector continued with the establishment of Swabhumi the Heritage Plaza which showcased craft and culture from different parts of the country


The Neotia Effect
Following the diversification of business operations the group rebranded itself as Ambuja Realty and wholeheartedly dedicated itself into the domains of residential properties retail parks hospitality business parks healthcare and education

Business Expansion

Retail business experienced expansion with the establishment of City Centre
Haldia and City Centre Raipur Besides other commercial properties viz

  Present Years
Ambuja Neotia 
Following the demise of industry doyen Suresh Neotia the Group leadership passed to Harshavardhan Neotia
The Group established The Neotia University offering newage courses and holistic education The Group launched the flagship acre Utalika project Kolkata in  comprising landscaped greens nature trails and natural lakes with highend lifestyle features
The Group created Neotec Hub in  and incubation centre for guiding young entrepreneurs a collaboration with the S
Ambuja Neotia is one of the most prominent and respected corporate houses headquartered in Kolkata The company with its strong forte in real estate hospitality healthcare and education under the leadership of Shri Harshavardhan Neotia
label: POSITIVE
